mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SYS_USER (ID, LOGIN_NAME, PASSWORD, EXPIRED, DISABLED, NO, COMPANY_ID, OFFICE_ID, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, MOBILE, USER_TYPE, LOGIN_FLAG, NEW_WORKER, PHOTO, BIRTH_DATE, HIRE_DATE, REMARKS, ORDER_NUM, ROOM, FLAGPOSITION, PERSON_ID, CREATE_BY, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_BY, UPDATE_DATE, DEL_FLAG) values (#{id}, #{loginName}, #{password}, #{expired}, #{disabled}, #{no}, #{companyId}, #{officeId}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{mobile}, #{userType}, #{loginFlag}, #{newWorker}, #{photo}, #{birthDate}, #{hireDate}, #{remarks}, #{orderNum}, #{room}, #{flagposition}, #{personId}, #{createBy}, SYSDATE, #{updateBy}, SYSDATE, 0)

INSERT INTO SYS_ORG_USER ( COMPANY_ID, OFFICE_ID, USER_ID, OFFICE_NAME, POSTCODE, POSTNAME, LATESTARRIDATE, COMPANYNAME, LEAVEDATE, LEAVESTATUS, DEPARTFULLPATH, JOBCATEGORY, JOBGRADE, ACTIVESTATUS, JOBLEVEL, JOBNAME, JOBCATEGORYNAME, JOBLEVELNAME, JOBGRADENAME, POSITIONLEVEL, JOBLEVELDATE, MDM_USER_ID, OLDINFOID, PROCRESULT, ID ) values ( #{companyId}, #{officeId}, #{userId}, #{officeName}, #{postcode}, #{postname}, #{latestarridate}, #{companyname}, #{leavedate}, #{leavestatus}, #{departfullpath}, #{jobcategory}, #{jobgrade}, #{activestatus}, #{joblevel}, #{jobname}, #{jobcategoryname}, #{joblevelname}, #{jobgradename}, #{positionlevel}, #{jobleveldate}, #{mdmUserId}, #{oldinfoid}, #{procresult}, #{id} )

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT t1.ID, t1.NO, t1.NAME, t1.PHONE, t1.MOBILE, t1.EMAIL, t1.ROOM, t1.HIRE_DATE, t2.POSTNAME AS POST_NAME, t1.COMPANY_ID, t1.OFFICE_ID, t5.NAME AS COMPANY_NAME, t4.NAME AS OFFICE_NAME, concat(REPLACE(t6.BASEURL, 'http://10.11.70.38:8080', 'http://mbtt.wzmtr.com:4443'), t6.ORGINPHOTO) as PHOTO, concat(REPLACE(t6.BASEURL, 'http://10.11.70.38:8080', 'http://mbtt.wzmtr.com:4443'), t6.BIGPHOTO) as BIG_PHOTO, concat(REPLACE(t6.BASEURL, 'http://10.11.70.38:8080', 'http://mbtt.wzmtr.com:4443'), t6.SMALLPHOTO) as SMALL_PHOTO FROM SYS_USER t1 LEFT JOIN SYS_ORG_USER t2 ON t2.USER_ID=t1.ID and t2.OFFICE_ID=t1.OFFICE_ID and t2.ACTIVESTATUS=1 AND t2.LEAVEDATE>=SYSDATE left join SYS_OFFICE t4 on t4.ID=t1.OFFICE_ID and t4.DEL_FLAG=0 and t4.USEABLE=1 left join SYS_OFFICE t5 on t5.ID=t1.COMPANY_ID and t5.DEL_FLAG=0 and t5.USEABLE=1 left join (select CEMPID,max(BASEURL) AS BASEURL,max(ORGINPHOTO) AS ORGINPHOTO,max(BIGPHOTO) AS BIGPHOTO,max(SMALLPHOTO) AS SMALLPHOTO from SYS_PHOTO group by CEMPID) t6 on t6.CEMPID=t1.PERSON_ID WHERE t1.ID=#{userId} and t1.DEL_FLAG=0 ) WHERE rownum=1
